this game is broken and the devs need to have a publishing company take over this project. This game uses PS2 graphics, survivors running objects is enough  to evade a killer, image watching Jason in the movies chasing his victims around a rock and to never catch up to them. Too many useless perks with very few strong perks that are used too often. fix this game BHVR stop creating nonsense and focus on fixing the foundation of this game!!!! This game will never become an esport title due to state of this game.

Played an additional 100 hours, yep my review still remains the same. This "game" is toxic so it only attracts toxicity.

まず大前提にマッチングしない。マッチングしたと思ったらかなりランク差のあるガバマッチに放り込まれる。
このゲームはアップデートするたびにバグを増やし、本来改善されるべき場所に一向に手を付けようとしない。
またアップデートされてからむしろ悪くなった部分が多い気がする。この会社は会議でどう悪く進めていくのかを検討しているのではないかと思うぐらいにゴミ要素がある。
ゲーム自体はとても面白いが、如何せんバグがゴミすぎる。
ゲームがフリーズし落ちた時もゲームに復帰できないくせに、ランクを下げられマッチ待機というペナルティを出されるくらい理不尽である。
これらのことから、私はこの会社はゲームをより悪くするために日々アップデートをしているのではないかと考えている。
its really fun as surviver if u LOOP PPL

Игра очень интересная и увлекательная, донат тут не решает как некоторые говорят.

OK, serious review. Dead by Daylight is a fun game with a lot of content. The game has been really fun to grow with. The game is at the time of its life... its really great! Gets a bad rep for bugs, but most of the time it's either internet or inconvenient timing. Balance is alright, really fun to play with friends!

dbd ... dead by daylight .... were do i  begin this is one of the first and best multiplayer slashers in history and i'm willing to fight on that this game is over 3  years old and still manages to keep up with any other game sure it may seam like any other old multiplayer game but its not it takes some of the most simple concepts an blows the right out of proportion plague fast lady with illness but thats not all you need to know how to play like a plague with the many unlocks that can change your mobility so you can infect fountains shoot farther plague has all this mobility that not many killers have unlike trapper you think a man with a ton of traps but its more then that trapping is the most bazaar mechanics in history bringing a bulky slow class to the fastest deathslinger is just amazing shoot is so good put out survivors reflect projectiles an so much more like removing totems and gen kicking hillbilly with his many different play-styles area charge or strategic with charging and head counter trimping also a way to reach high speeds oni a big man with a bigger sword but he can activate blood mode and down survivors the pig traps bringing area denial and removers that save life and stuff that win games or battle pig that makes pig her own fat nuts kills the team but you can make them invincible or grant 100 percent crits quick healing or a big resistance to damage ghostface a great dps insta kills and minicrits if he can lad his jar of piss on ya and more can be found with the many killers in dead by daylight all and all this is an amazing game get it play for a bit customize your play style and and our lord and savior gaben once said " have fun ~ Gabe Newell 2009 "

(This is satire, please don't take this seriously)

Arkadaşlar oyun ilk başlarda eğlenceli baya ama rank olarak ilerledikçe işler kızışıyor. Oyundaki perkler oyunun kaderini etkileyebiliyor ve bunları doğru kullanırsanız eğer kaybetmek üzereyken kazanabiilirsiniz. Oyunda pinginizin ve FPS nizin iyi olması lazım yoksa hitboxlarda problem yaşayabilirsiniz. Örneğin, katilin 120 FPS si vardır fakat sizin 60 FPS niz vardır ve katil size vurduktan sonra ona öyle gözükse bile size vurmamış olabilir. Buna sinirlenmeyin. 1000 saatlik tecrübemle size şunu söyleyeyim: Oyundaki perkleri ve katillerin özel güçlerini iyice öğrenin ve haritaları ezberleyin. Bu oyunu öğrenmesi kolay ama prolaşması zor...
an awesome game to play, especially with friends. there is a good amount of killers to choose from aswell as survivors and there is a good variety of well made maps.

Dead By Daylight é um jogo bem viciante, perfeito para jogar com amigos. Ele ta sempre sendo atualizado, trazendo novos conteúdos, fazendo ajustes e correção de bugs (E adição de bugs, por que a Behaviour ama isso -q). O jogo é bem simples, sobreviventes fazem gerador e fogem da partida, assassino tem que sacrifica-los.

Pontos Positivos:
- O jogo sempre tem atualizações, adicionando mais mapas, assassinos e sobreviventes.
- Personagens de outras franquias participam desse jogo, então pode sempre vir algo de outras franquias, como ja ocorreu com jogos como Silent Hill e Left 4 Dead, filmes como Hora do Pesadelo, Halloween, Massacre da Serra Elétrica.
- Atualizações de mapa, eles estão sempre atualizando alguns mapas antigos, para deixar eles mais bonitos e otimizados.
- Cada assassino é bem diferente do outro, então é muito divertido como tu precisa aprender jogar contra cada um, ou com cada um.

Pontos Negativos:
- Comunidade bem ruim, sempre tem um latino no final te chamando de macaco ou coisas do tipo.
- Skins, acho meio ridiculo o jogo ter skins pagas, sendo que tu precisa comprar o game, e também algumas dlcs (Pode comprar todas, mas algumas da pra contornar).
- Provavelmente você vai achar um lado mais roubado que outro, e sempre vai se encher com isso. Sobreviventes acham o jogo facilitado pro killer, e os killer acham pra sobreviventes.
- A otimização do jogo é uma bosta, então mesmo tendo uma maquina potente, é dificil jogar ele numa qualidade muito boa.
- Toxicidade reina, principalmente entre sobreviventes que gostam de parecer engraçado em streams.

Much better than the mobile version! Love it

セールで買おうとする「野良しかやらない養分」と「ゲームは楽しいもの」と思い込んでる人はやることを推奨しません。なぜかって？今まではただ「生存者有利ゲーでバランス崩壊してるから」と言っていたのだが最近は大分その考えが変わってきた。なぜ考えが変わったか？答えは単純、「明らかに沼プレイしかしない生存者が目に見えて多くなってきた」からだ。まず２試合に１人から２人はゲームから早く退場したいがためにディスコネクト（切断）するド阿呆と「あえて」キラーに近寄って自殺するプレイヤー、発電機を修理して通電させるのがゲームの目的なのに発電機を修理せずアーカイブ（条件クリアでバトルパスのような期間限定経験値が手に入るもの）の達成をただ考えるだけのゴ☆ミプレイヤー殿といった明らかに通常プレイすらしてない初心者とも言えないレベルの沼が「必ず」野良では２試合に１人から２人は試合にいる状況。ここまで読んでも「買う！」っていう猛者に伝えておく。生存者も殺人鬼も野良だと度を過ぎるほど「キツイ」と覚えておいてほしい。やるなら友達とワイワイ生存者「だけ」やるんだ。動画や配信見て「楽しいかも！」と思っても、あなた自身が野良でプレイしても楽しいと感じれるようになるまで２００時間はかかると覚悟しておくんだ。「別のプレイヤーに一切期待するな」と言われるだろうが「チームで今やるべき行動をしないと勝てない」時点で野良では生存者はプレイするのは控えるんだ。本当に後悔することになるから。
Genial para jugar con amigos, sacan mucho contenido nuevo.
It has its moments but it truly is fun despite that.
One of the best co-op which i've played

игра хуета полная, баланса полный ноль. за сурва на 12-10 ранге тебе в маньяки может выпасть 4-3 ранг, и наоборот, если ты ман с 10-8 рангом, то тебе выпадет фулл пати из 4-2 рангов. Также в игре много софтеров и багов, из-за которых играть неудобно и неприятно. Челы очень часто тимятся с маньяками и руинят своим тиммейтам катки. система репортов кривая и иногда читерам всё сходит с рук. Конечно на низких рангах весело и приятно играть, но на высоких происходит полный пиздец, и, как по мне, способы получать удовольствие от этой игры - это играть со своими друзьями, либо деранкаться на низкие ранги. Однако, это строго моё мнение, и осуждать или признавать его - это вам решать.
Моя оценка 5-10

"mmr" in this one is pretty fake - im not sure how its determined but its seemingly random, as a multiplayer only game, matchmaking at its core should be a good experience. Far little gets tested to fix it, but they are adding micro-transactions at a really high rate ....

I like this game but the matchmaking is terrible. Im a rank 17 killer w/12 hours of gameplay and Im routinely matched against survivors who are fully stacked with perks/gear who are red/purple/green ranked players who undoubtedly have thousands of hours of game time and I stand no chance whatsoever. If you like a steep learning curve and getting shit on by pros maybe this game is for you, otherwise get use to losing, A LOT.

there are some of the  most infuriating killer builds that kill you before you even get a chance to get started and I'm only rank 18. If  you wanna a game to rage at because its broken af this is the one.

Comenzó interesante, pero a medida que el juego avanza te das cuenta que jugar de killer no rinde. Los survivors te reparan 3 generadores de 5 en menos de 1 min, si no jugás como los dioses, tenes ciertas perks específicas y no bajas al survivor en una persecusión en menos de 20 segundos la partida se te complica mucho. Nerfeen a los survivors, agreguen más generadores o hagan algo con los killers, porque ya ni ganas de jugar. Reseña de un killer rango 1.
200 hours finally hit and i think all Killers are extremely balanced people. Especially Cannibal and Hillbilly. 😂
